question: 速度
sourceMnemonic:
Your <kanji>fast</kanji>ness <kanji>degree</kanji> is your <vocabulary>speed</vocabulary>. 

You use <ja>速度</ja> to talk about a specific speed of something like a car or a train. If you want to talk about speed more casually, you can just say <ja>スピード</ja> or <ja>速さ</ja>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
